law.text: The collection, removal and disposition of all waste from premises in the City shall be under the jurisdiction of the City Manager, except as otherwise provided in this Code. (Code 1959 , §19-27; Ord. No. 1983-245-TC-205, §6, 12-6-83; Ord. No. 1985-613, §5, 7-16-85; Ord. No. 1987-25, §1, 8-4-87; Ord. No. 1998-454, §9, 11-4-98)
